statements: UPDATE shopping_cart_abandonment_rates SET quantity = 5, total_amount = 25.99 WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE shopping_cart_abandonment_rates SET total_amount = 15.75, abandonment_time = '2022-03-10 08:30:00' WHERE product_id = 101 AND user_id = '98765432-1234-9876-5678-123456789abc';
UPDATE shopping_cart_abandonment_rates SET total_amount = total_amount * 0.9, quantity = quantity + 1 WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE shopping_cart_abandonment_rates SET abandonment_time = NOW(), total_amount = total_amount + 15.5 WHERE product_id = 101 AND quantity >= 2;
UPDATE ShoppingCartAbandonmentRates SET abandon_timestamp = '2022-01-01 10:00:00' WHERE user_id = 1 AND cart_id = 123;
UPDATE ShoppingCartItems SET quantity = 5, item_name = 'New name' WHERE cart_id = 456 AND item_id = 789;

UPDATE ShoppingCartAbandonmentRates SET user_id = 123, abandon_timestamp = NOW() WHERE cart_id = 200
